ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is use to validate amount, number of units and units price must be greater than zero and must select one option from required or override.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Amount__c <= 0 || Unit_Price__c <= 0 || Units__c <= 0 || (Required__c == False && Override__c == False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please input valid information as in amount, number of units and unit price must be greater than zero with select at least one from required or override checkbox.
